Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG SGH-T239 PHONE
Reviews.Author: Ruby Wilson
Reviews.Content: It,s a very handy and compact phone so small it can fit in the palm of your hand. I love this cell phone

Reviews.Title: Very nice and compact phone
Reviews.Author: becc
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed. Compact. Mainly for calling with the good camera option. My favorite color too. Very reasonable price!!!!

Reviews.Title: phones
Reviews.Author: Charles J.Hobbs
Reviews.Content: My mom want something simple. I know samsung has good phones. something she can us and not so tech. she's happy.

Reviews.Title: I love it,very sleekly!
Reviews.Author: GEORGINA O.
Reviews.Content: The moment I saw it,I just fell in love becos is a sliding phone ,the problem I have with it is just that it does not work in my locality,but I think if a quad band with MHZ 900/1900 is produced the same,is gonna be perfect for me!

Reviews.Title: phone quality
Reviews.Author: jerry riley
Reviews.Content: the phone functions ok but am disappointed in the construction of the phone. The two segments of the phone are "loose"..almost as if the phone had been previously used.the sections do not fit snugly. this sort of thing agitates me but not the user for whom the phone was purchased. I wanted to return it but.......The delivery time was fine.

ProductInfo.Features:
Cool Slider Prepaid Phone That Fit In Your Pocket and Your Budget
Bluetooth Enabled To Connect Wirelessly To Other Devices - Like Headsets For Hands-free Conversation
VGA Camera Has Multiple Shot Modes and A 4x Zoom To Snap Fun Photos
Connect Any Way You Want: Call, IM, Text or Picture Message
No Data Plan Required
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SGH-T239 T-Mobile Phone (Maroon)
